sentences.en: After lunch, she watched, listened and coaxed Bobby into talking about himself.
sentences.cn: 吃过午饭，她照看着博比，听他说话，哄他说说自己的事。

sentences.en: All the while the people at the next table watched me eat.
sentences.cn: 我吃东西的时候邻桌的人一直在看我。

sentences.en: Felix watched his men move like soldiers, spreading out into two teams.
sentences.cn: 费利克斯看着他的手下像士兵一样散开分成了两队。

sentences.en: For a few seconds we watched the unearthly lights on the water.
sentences.cn: 有那么几秒钟，我们注视着水面上那些奇异的光。

sentences.en: He seems to enjoy watching me work.
He stopped and watched with amusement to see the child so absorbed.
sentences.cn: 他停下来，饶有兴趣地看着孩子如此投入。

sentences.en: He turned with a little nod and I watched him walk away.
sentences.cn: 他边点了点头边转过身，我看着他走了。

sentences.en: He watched as the Yankees rallied for a second comeback victory.
sentences.cn: 他看着北方佬为了又一次东山再起而集结。

sentences.en: He watched the barman prepare the beer he had ordered.
sentences.cn: 他看着酒吧招待员备好他点的啤酒。

sentences.en: Here, now watch how I cut this, OK?
sentences.cn: 嘿，现在看我怎样切，好吗？

sentences.en: I sat in the garden and watched the passing cars.
sentences.cn: 我坐在花园里，看着过往车辆。

sentences.en: I watched a slow-motion videotape replay of his fall.
sentences.cn: 我看了一遍录像带上他摔倒时的慢动作重放。

sentences.en: I watched the moth crawl up the outside of the lampshade.
sentences.cn: 我看着飞蛾爬到灯罩外面。

sentences.en: Joseph watched a shady-looking bunch playing cards aboard a Mississippi steamer.
sentences.cn: 约瑟夫看到一群可疑的人在密西西比河的一艘轮船上打牌。

sentences.en: She watched the frantic flow of cars and buses along the street.
sentences.cn: 她注视着街上小汽车和巴士汇成的滚滚车流。

sentences.en: The girls watched, little teasing smiles animating their faces.
sentences.cn: 女孩们注视着，脸上挂着调皮的微笑，显得愈加活泼。

sentences.en: The man was standing in his doorway watching him.
sentences.cn: 那个男人正站在自家门道里看着他。

sentences.en: These programmes are each watched by around 19 million viewers every week.
sentences.cn: 这些电视节目的观众各自都在每周1,900万左右。

sentences.en: They watched almost open-mouthed as the two men came towards them.
sentences.cn: 他们几乎目瞪口呆地看着那两个人朝他们走过来。

phrases.tran_cn: 注意寻找；戒备；小心提防

trans.tran_en: If you watch someone or something, you look at them, usually for a period of time, and pay attention to what is happening

trans.tran_cn: 注视，注意（watch的过去式与过去分词形式）
